teachers.name: Bev Visser
teachers.description: Bev grew up up in Johannesburg, South Africa. She studied communications and was a stay-at-home mum to her 3 children. Since living in Switzerland, she saw the need for qualified English teachers and completed her CELTA training in 2012. She lives in Rafz. She values working with her students and sharing her enjoyment of the language.

certificates.name: "Cambridge Certificate in Teaching English as a Foreign Language"

teachers.name: Angela Eibner
teachers.description: Angela grew up and went to university in London. On coming to Switzerland she trained as an English language teacher. She has been teaching with great pleasure for over 30 years. Besides the MA in English Language Teaching, she has a Business English qualification and a Diploma in Adult Education. She lives with her family in Rafz.
